title: Call Center Specialists for Dental & Orthodontic Offices
job_overview:
US-Based Marketing Agency Hiring: Bilingual Call Center Specialists for Dental & Orthodontic Offices

Responsibilities:
- Answer inbound calls and make outbound calls on behalf of dental and ortho practices
- Schedule and confirm patient appointments
- Provide exceptional customer service and follow-up
- Enter and update patient information into practice management software
- Communicate with dental office staff for appointment coordination

Requirements:
1. Bilingual â€“ must speak and write English and Spanish fluently
2. Call center or front desk experience in a dental, orthodontic, or medical setting preferred
3. Excellent verbal communication and listening skills
4. Reliable internet connection and quiet home work environment
5. Tech-savvy, quick learner, and detail-oriented
6. Ability to work US business hours
7. Professional and friendly demeanor

Why Work With Us?
- Supportive remote team
- Growth opportunities within the company
- Work-from-home setup
- Consistent, long-term projects

To Apply:
Send your updated resume and a short voice recording (introducing yourself and describing your relevant experience) to Upgrade to see actual info

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted. 

We look forward to hearing from you!
